long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash the energy of Satoru Gojo in every tab! Get this anime-inspired live wallpaper now for a fresh and vibrant browser experience.

Step into the world of Satoru Gojo with the Splash Chrome extension! Every time you open a new tab, you'll be welcomed by a vibrant splash of color and power, capturing Gojo's dynamic energy. This extension is perfect for Jujutsu Kaisen fans who want to transform their browsing experience.

Features:
Splashing Live Wallpaper: Experience an exciting new tab with Gojo’s signature style and energy filling your screen.
Integrated Clock & Date: Keep track of time while enjoying anime-inspired visuals.
Quick Access Links: Convenient shortcuts to your most-used websites, right from the new tab.
Easy Options: Access additional features, read the privacy policy, or uninstall with just a click.
With Satoru Gojo Splash, your new tab becomes a canvas for Gojo’s boundless power. Whether you're a fan of the anime or just looking to add some excitement to your browser, this extension delivers.

Download now to bring Gojo’s vibrant energy to your daily browsing!
